reviews.text: Magnolia was fantastic from beginning to end. Their team kept us up to date through the whole permitting/planning phase. After that, they had their subs lined up and ready to go so there wasn’t a delay between phases. They made our process turnkey, final pricing was right on budget and they were hands on and responsive the whole time. Can’t recommend Dakota, Michael, and the whole team enough!

Guys showed up around noon. They worked consistently until they were done. I had a patio area fenced, fence put around my ac unit, and a larger gate put in so I could access my back yard. I would highly recommend them. Collin was very nice & respectful to me as a widow of a veteran & my boyfriend who is an army veteran.

I am so happy with the service that Magnolia provided with the installation of my new gate and fence. Very professional,  knowledgeable and service oriented.
Extra shout out to Collin for all your help and diligence!

Magnolia rebuilt a large double gate and added height to both the gate and fence going from 6 ft to around 9 ft in some places.

I’d say this job had a lot of custom aspects due to utilizing some preexisting features of our old fence.  Collin understood exactly what needed to be done during our initial planning meeting.  That information was perfectly conveyed to the build team.

Excellent workmanship.  Very timely. Very professional.

The price was reasonable for what we asked for and received.

Our new fence with Magnolia was a fantastic experience from start to finish. The team had great attention to detail from their demolition to the construction of our new beautiful fence. Phenomenal service and quality. We are super thrilled with the amazing work they did with our fence. The pre-stained wood option is the way to go. Our project manager was exceptionally responsive and the work crew guys were the best. Completely upgraded our yard and home.  Could not be happier.

What I love about Magnolia is they don't dilly dally with their work. You have an issue, they get to work, and it gets done. They are reliable. You can count on them to do what they say they are going to do when they say they are going to do it. Pretty simple idea, but not everyone gets it. Great experience with them.
I called Magnolia for their irrigation services.  The staff was communicative and punctual. I asked for head replacement and relocation, to which an outstanding job was completed.
We love our new fence. The team was amazing and Collin was very professional and great to work with.
Magnolia did a great job! They came out an installed a few metal posts and repaired my fence after a strong wind storm. Highly recommended! Pricing was good as well.

I know Magnolia Fence & Patio through my work in the fence industry, and their professionalism and quality of work always stands out. They’re a customer of the brand I work for, and I wouldn’t hesitate to hire them for my own home. Their craftsmanship, attention to detail, and commitment to doing the job right make them a fantastic choice for anyone looking to build or update a fence or patio. Highly recommend!

The workmanship was outstanding
My suggestions for future work - let the customer know up front what the schedule of work would be so they can plan their own time to be there if needed.
The clean up can be a lot better following each phase
Finally discuss payment schedule prior to start of job

Loved our experience working with Magnolia Fence & Patio!

The guys we had cleaned as they went, and even put back the construction fencing we put up to contain our dogs. The fence is exactly what we asked for and the crew cleaned hauled off any remaining debris when the job was complete.

The work they did was fantastic. My yard looks great. The crew they sent was very professional and kind of my pets, huge plus. Don’t hesitate to try their services.

Collin was very prompt answering all of my questions and the crew did a great job putting up a very nice looking fence. I will be calling them again for my next project.
